related_questions.question: How is solar energy used by humans?

related_questions.question: How solar energy is useful to us?
related_questions.snippet: Help the environment and help us all. Solar power systems derive clean, pure energy from the sun. Installing solar panels on your home helps combat greenhouse gas emissions and reduces our collective dependence on fossil fuel. Traditional electricity is sourced from fossil fuels such as coal and natural gas.Apr 5, 2017
